data.text: “Kana irratti onneen koo ni dhikkifata;
Dhaggeeffadhaa! Iyya sagalee isaa,
Inni bakakkaa isaa samii hunda jalatti gad dhiisa;
Ergasii sagaleen guungummii isaa ni dhufa;
Sagaleen Waaqaa haala dinqisiisaadhaan ni qaqawweessaʼa;
Inni cabbiidhaan, ‘Lafa irra buʼi;’
Akka namni inni uume hundi hojii isaa beekuuf,
Bineensonni holqa isaaniitti galu;
Bubbeen hamaan iddoo isaatii ni baʼa;
Hafuurri Waaqni baafatu cabbii uuma;
Inni duumessoota bishaan baachisa;
Isaan waan inni ajaju hunda hojjechuuf,
Inni namoota adabuuf, yookaan lafa isaa obaasee
“Yaa Iyyoob waan kana dhaggeeffadhu; mee of qabiitii
Waaqni akkamitti duumessoota
Akka itti duumessoonni wal qixxaatanii rarraʼan,
Ati kan yeroo lafti bubbee kibbaatiin calʼistutti
samii akkuma of-ilaalee naasii baqfamee jabaatu sana
“Waan nu isaan jennu nutti himi;
Akka ani dubbachuu fedhu isatti himamuu qabaa?
Erga qilleensi samiiwwan qulqulleessee booddee,
Waaqni bareedina warqeetiin kaabaa ni dhufa;
Waaqni Waan Hunda Dandaʼu hubannaa keenyaa oli;
Kanaafuu, namoonni isa sodaatu;
